definition: to reflect/reflection (from a mirror etc)/reflex (i.e. automatic reaction of organism)
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system

sentences.english: In this paper, we propose a mathematical model of planar reflector on the Solar pond.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了太阳池反射板的数学模型，并进行了计算。

sentences.english: The direction of light reflected from an object depends on its alignment.
sentences.chinese: 光线的方向会根据对象的位置发生反射。

sentences.english: The results showed that the reflectivities varied during the wound healing process.
sentences.chinese: 结果显示激光照射剂量对伤口组织的反射率影响不大。

sentences.english: The zero-offset (z0) section is an important achievement in seismic reflection imaging.
sentences.chinese: 零炮检距剖面是地震反射成像过程中的重要成果。

sentences.english: Objectives To study the baroreflex function in patients with vasovagal syncope.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价血管迷走性晕厥患者的压力反射器功能。

sentences.english: The most commonly used form of radar energy return mapping is the Base Reflectivity graph.
sentences.chinese: 最常用的雷达能量回程测绘形式是基本反射率图。

sentences.english: One is a spectrometer that measures sunlight reflected from the Earth's surface.
sentences.chinese: 一个是光谱仪，它测量从地球表面反射的阳光。

sentences.english: The OLC (Omni-directional luminance control ) provides excellent even lighting without glare.
sentences.chinese: 全方位反射，配光均匀，无眩光。

sentences.english: A team at U. C. San Diego had been searching for it.
sentences.chinese: 加大圣地牙哥校区的研究小组一直在寻找这个反射器。
“因陀罗的标枪”经过一个圆形的“反射体”而运作。

sentences.english: These seawalls are highly reflective of incident wave energy.
sentences.chinese: 这种海堤能把大部分的入射波浪能量反射。

sentences.english: Objective To talk about the regularity and characteristic of blind reflex of patients of with brain steam trauma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨脑干损伤患者瞬目反射的规律及特点。

sentences.english: Sunlight reflecting off the water’s surface gives it a pale, silvery blue color.
sentences.chinese: 水面上太阳光反射让水面呈现出银白蓝色。

sentences.english: All in-camera meters are reflected-light meters. Reflected-light meters are calibrated to show the appropriate exposure for "average" scenes.
sentences.chinese: 所有融合在照相机内的测光表都是反射式的。

sentences.english: My swallowing reflex was destroyed, I couldn't even drink.
sentences.chinese: 吞咽反射被破坏，我甚至无法饮水。

sentences.english: In the reflection is a paint-by-number horse.
sentences.chinese: 镜子里反射的是一张马的按数字涂颜色的画。

definition: to shine on/to light up/to irradiate
to transmit/transmission (of radiation through a medium)/passage
light/beam of light/gleam of light/light reflected from an object
